Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 46th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1966...
Injured on 8/11/1967 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/12/1970, off Steve D. Barber (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/23/1970, off Bobby Bolin (SF)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to San Francisco on 1/31/1973 (Going to SF: CF B. Russell. Going to CHC: P A. Hassler)...
Won World Series with San Francisco in 1973...
